#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long sum(long long n)
{
	long long val =0;
	for(long long i=1;i<=n/2;i++)
		if(!(n%i))
			val+=i;
	return val;
}
 
int main()
{
	long long t,n,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		j = sum(n);
		if(sum(j)==n)cout<<"Yes, amicable with "<<j<<endl;
		else cout<<"No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
